message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11,000? I really think this product would be a great fit for me, and I'd be happy to make a decision quickly if we can come to an agreement.
